concept.title: Configuring a user account on the DataPower appliance
concept.shortdesc: The DataPower user ID used by the data collector must belong to a user group with the following permissions:

ul.li: Read permission on the Login XML-Mgmt Resource Type in the default domain.
Read permission on the XML-Mgmt Resource Type in each domain to be monitored using this user ID.
Read permission on the (any) Resource Type in each domain to be monitored using this user ID.

conbody.p: See your DataPower WebGUI Guide or DataPower CLI Reference Guide for details on configuring user group permissions.
